title: Farmers tell their stories: Laser leveling of rice fields in Southeast Asia

tasks.task: Operating laser leveling equipment for rice fields
subtasks: Placing the laser transmitter at the side of the field
Attaching the laser receiver to the leveling bucket
Connecting the control panel to the hydraulic valve
Guiding the tractor over the field to level the soil
Using the receiver signals to adjust the leveling bucket
Drilling and dragging soil to even out the field

tasks.task: Manual leveling using draft animals and tractors
subtasks: Harnessing draft animals to pull harrows and leveling boards
Towing a harrow or leveling board across the flooded field
Repeating the process in different directions to ensure evenness
Checking the field’s uniformity for water coverage and crop growth

tasks.task: Applying best practices for rice cultivation after leveling
subtasks: Choosing the right timing for laser leveling (dry season or before planting)
Utilizing direct seeding with a drum seeder on leveled fields
Managing alternate wetting and drying irrigation methods
Controlling weeds using row weeders on well-leveled plots
Applying fertilizers evenly to minimize lodging
Monitoring for pests and diseases, considering reduced hiding spots from leveled fields

tasks.task: Evaluating the economic impact of laser leveling
subtasks: Calculating cost-sharing between farmers and government for equipment
Tracking improvements in yield and income per hectare
Assessing savings on water usage and fuel consumption
Documenting the benefits in terms of improved livelihoods and purchasing power

tasks.task: Promoting laser leveling technology in Southeast Asian countries
subtasks: Organizing demonstrations and workshops for farmers and extension workers
Training local farmers on the operation and maintenance of laser leveling equipment
Integrating laser levelling into the national agricultural policy
Collaborating with international organizations and private sectors for support
Continuously monitoring the adoption rate and scaling the technology
Sharing success stories and data to inspire further investment and participation
